sentences.sentence: The meetings will be held on an ad hoc basis.
sentences.translation: 会议将根据需要随时举行。

sentences.sentence: "I would accept opportunities in TV on an ad hoc basis," he said.
sentences.translation: “在特别需要时我会接受在电视上露面的机会，”他说道。

sentences.sentence: What exactly do you mean by ad hoc jobs?
